title: Remove payment options section from booking flow

requirements.text: Remove the PaymentSection component from BookingModal. After successful booking form submission, close the modal immediately and trigger WhatsApp redirect without showing any payment UI.

quotes: Yes Remove Payment  Options on this site

acceptanceCriteria: PaymentSection component is not rendered in BookingModal
After booking form submission, the modal closes immediately
WhatsApp redirect happens directly after successful booking submission
No UPI or QR code payment options are displayed anywhere in the booking flow

requirements.text: Remove the PaymentSection.tsx component file from frontend/src/components since it is no longer used in the application.

quotes: Yes Remove Payment  Options on this site

acceptanceCriteria: PaymentSection.tsx file is removed from the codebase
No imports or references to PaymentSection remain in other components

requirements.text: Update the BookingModal component to immediately redirect to WhatsApp after successful booking submission with the pre-filled message: 'Hello Navixa Express, I want to book a shipment. My booking details are submitted on the website.' No payment confirmation step should occur.

quotes: Yes Remove Payment  Options on this site

acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp redirect occurs immediately after successful booking
Pre-filled message is correctly formatted with booking confirmation text
WhatsApp number 8530661581 is used for the redirect
User does not see any intermediate payment screens

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or booking data storage
Preserve the existing booking form fields and validation logic
Maintain WhatsApp integration functionality with the same phone number and message format
nonGoals: Modifying the booking form structure or fields
Altering the hero section, about section, or contact section
